tasks.name: Create inventory of files containing Chinese content
tasks.description: Identify all files in the project that contain Chinese characters, with primary focus on the src/prompts/generators/ directory. Create a comprehensive list of files requiring translation and catalog recurring terms for consistent translation.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Use grep or similar tools to search for Chinese Unicode character ranges [\u4e00-\u9fff] across the project
2. Focus primarily on src/prompts/generators/ directory files
3. Create a documentation file listing all identified files containing Chinese content
4. For each file, note the types of Chinese content (comments, strings) and any patterns or recurring phrases
5. Create a translation glossary for consistent terminology across files
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. Complete list of all files containing Chinese characters is documented
2. Each file in the list is verified to contain Chinese content
3. Types of Chinese content (comments, strings) are properly categorized
4. Translation glossary contains common terms and their English equivalents
5. No files containing Chinese characters are missed
tasks.analysisResult:
## Technical Analysis

After examining the codebase, I've identified that the primary targets for translation are TypeScript files in the src/prompts/generators/ directory. These files contain Chinese content in three main forms:

1. JSDoc comments documenting file purpose, interfaces, and functions
2. Inline comments explaining code functionality
3. Hardcoded Chinese strings used in the application

The task is relatively straightforward as it involves content translation rather than functional changes. However, careful attention must be paid to:

1. **Maintaining Technical Accuracy**: Ensure translations preserve the technical meaning of comments
2. **Consistency**: Use consistent terminology across all files
3. **Preserving Code Functionality**: Ensure string replacements don't break existing functionality

The primary focus is to replace all Chinese content with accurate English translations while maintaining code functionality and consistent terminology throughout the project.

tasks.name: Translate listTasks.ts file
tasks.description: Translate all Chinese content in the src/prompts/generators/listTasks.ts file, including JSDoc comments, inline comments, and hardcoded strings, while maintaining code functionality and documentation format.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Read the entire listTasks.ts file to understand its functionality
2. Identify all Chinese comments and strings requiring translation
3. Translate JSDoc comments while preserving documentation format
4. Translate inline comments with appropriate technical terminology
5. Replace hardcoded Chinese strings (e.g., "任何", "沒有依賴") with English equivalents
6. Preserve code structure, indentation, and line breaks
7. Ensure variable references in string interpolation remain intact
8. Use terminology consistent with the translation glossary
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. All Chinese characters in the file are replaced with English
2. JSDoc format is preserved and documentation remains technically accurate
3. Code functionality is unchanged
4. No Chinese characters remain in the file
5. Terminology is consistent with the translation glossary
6. Code structure and formatting are maintained

tasks.name: Translate remaining generator files
tasks.description: Identify and translate all remaining files in the src/prompts/generators/ directory that contain Chinese content, based on the inventory created in the first task. This includes translating JSDoc comments, inline comments, and hardcoded strings.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Reference the inventory of files created in the first task
2. For each remaining file not already covered in individual tasks:
   a. Read the file to understand its functionality
   b. Identify all Chinese comments and strings requiring translation
   c. Translate JSDoc comments while preserving documentation format
   d. Translate inline comments with appropriate technical terminology
   e. Replace hardcoded Chinese strings with English equivalents
   f. Preserve code structure, indentation, and line breaks
   g. Ensure variable references in string interpolation remain intact
   h. Use terminology consistent with the translation glossary
3. Document all files processed and translations made
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. All Chinese characters in the remaining generator files are replaced with English
2. JSDoc format is preserved and documentation remains technically accurate
3. Code functionality is unchanged
4. No Chinese characters remain in any of the processed files
5. Terminology is consistent with the translation glossary
6. Code structure and formatting are maintained

tasks.name: Check for Chinese content in other project areas
tasks.description: Search and verify if there are any Chinese characters in other areas of the project outside the src/prompts/generators/ directory, and translate them if found.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Use grep or similar tools to search for Chinese Unicode character ranges [\u4e00-\u9fff] across the entire project, excluding already processed files
2. Document any additional files found containing Chinese characters
3. For each file found:
   a. Assess the context and purpose of the Chinese content
   b. Translate all Chinese text to English while preserving code functionality
   c. Update the documentation to include these additional files
4. If no additional files are found, document this finding
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. A comprehensive search of the entire project is completed
2. All files containing Chinese characters outside the generators directory are identified
3. Any found Chinese content is translated to English
4. Documentation is updated with findings and actions taken
5. No Chinese characters remain in the entire project

tasks.name: Verify translations and consistency
tasks.description: Conduct a comprehensive review of all translations to ensure accuracy, consistency of terminology, and preservation of code functionality across all modified files.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Review all translated files to ensure:
   a. All Chinese characters have been replaced
   b. Translations are technically accurate
   c. Terminology is consistent across files
   d. Code structure and formatting are maintained
2. Run grep or similar tools to verify no Chinese characters remain in the codebase
3. Check for consistency in key terms across all translated files
4. Verify that code functionality has been preserved
5. Document any inconsistencies or issues found and address them
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. No Chinese characters remain in any part of the codebase
2. Terminology is consistent across all translated files
3. All translations are accurate and preserve technical meaning
4. Code functionality is unchanged
5. Documentation is clear and technically correct
6. All identified issues are resolved

tasks.name: Final project testing
tasks.description: Test the entire project to ensure all functionality works correctly after translation and no regressions have been introduced.
tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Run any existing project tests to verify functionality
2. Manually test the application to ensure all features work correctly
3. Verify UI text appears correctly in English
4. Check for any remaining Chinese text in the application interface
5. Document test results and any issues found
6. Address any issues identified during testing
tasks.verificationCriteria:
1. All existing tests pass successfully
2. Manual testing confirms all features work correctly
3. UI displays proper English text throughout
4. No Chinese characters appear anywhere in the application
5. No regressions or new issues are introduced
6. Test results are documented
